sections.heading: against governmental bodies; authorized
sections.text: The state, governmental agencies, and political subdivisions may be sued upon claims arising under the Age Discrimination in Employment Act in the same manner as provided by such act for suits against other employers.SourceLaws 1983, LB 424, ยง 4;Laws 2007, LB2

48-1010.Suits against governmental bodies; authorized.

The state, governmental agencies, and political subdivisions may be sued upon claims arising under the Age Discrimination in Employment Act in the same manner as provided by such act for suits against other employers.

SourceLaws 1983, LB 424, ยง 4;Laws 2007, LB265, ยง 21.
